card.name: Abandoned Nuke Silo
card.text:
Enemies can't blow up your Machines.
When this Base is blown up, put the top card of your Arsenal on top of your Backup Plans.

card.name: Accidental Portal to Hell
card.text: Discard up to two cards from under target Blueprint, then if there are no cards under it, blow it up.

card.name: Advantage Fabricator
card.text: At the start of your turn, put the top card of your Arsenal under this card. Then if this card has 2 or more cards under it, liquidate it and put those cards into your hand.

card.name: Alan Horner, Paleontologist
card.text:
Requires 1 Mook
Unique
When this Mook onboards or assaults, exchange up to two cards from your hand with that many cards from under one of your Blueprints.

card.name: Alien Crash Site
card.text:
Your Scientists get +4.
You can't be targeted by Schemes.

card.name: Amassed Production
card.text: Fabricate a number of Machines equal to your current Turn count or 3, whichever is lower.

card.name: Amber Track, Logistician
card.text:
Requires 1 Mook, 1 Machine
Unique
Once per turn, whenever a Mook you control is blown up by an effect that isn't yours, draw a card.

card.name: Amphibian Alteration
card.text: Until the end of your next turn, Mooks can't assault.

card.name: Ancient Ice Virus Replicator
card.text:
Whenever you fabricate a Machine, put the top card of your Arsenal under this card. Then, if this card has three or more Mooks under it, blow up target Mook.
At the start of your turn, if this card has eight cards under it, you win the game.

card.name: Anti-Machine Machinations
card.text: For each Goon you control, target a Machine. Flip those Machines facedown.

card.name: Arctic Ice Fortress
card.text:
You can't be assaulted by two or fewer Mooks.
Whenever this Base is blown up or liquidated, draw a card.

card.name: Armored Mook
card.text:
Requires 1 Machine
Gets +2 for each card in your hand.

card.name: Automatic Jumpscare
card.text:
When you fabricate this Machine, target a Mook. It can't assault or block as long as you control Automatic Jumpscare.
When that Mook is blown up, blow up this Machine.

card.name: Bribe the Guards
card.text: Up to two target Mooks can't block until end of turn.

card.name: Bribe World Leaders
card.text:
Whenever you play a Scheme, put it under this card instead of into your Garbage Pile.
At the start of your turn, if this card has eight Scheme cards under it, you win the game.

card.name: Brilliant Tactical Mind
card.text: Whenever an enemy plays a Scheme, after that Scheme resolves, you can blow up this Mook. If you do, you can play a Scheme from your hand.

card.name: Buff Physicist
card.text: This Mook gets +2 for each Backup Plan you have less than 6.

card.name: Cardboard Facade
card.text: If your Active Base would be blown up, you can blow up this Base instead. You can use this ability if this isn't your Active Base.

card.name: Charismatic Cult Leader
card.text: ðŸ”˜Liquidate 6 other nontoken Mooks: Charismatic Cult Leader becomes Myrianna, a Demon Leader with threat level 36 and gains invincible.

card.name: Charitable Donation
card.text: Give control of one of your Machines to another player.

card.name: Clipper Pirate
card.text: When you declare an assault with this Mook, target Mook loses Skilled Defender until end of turn.

card.name: Clockwork Soldier
card.text: This Machine can assault as though it were a Mook with Threat Level 8.

card.name: Commit Tax Evasion
card.text: Draw a card, then target Mook gets +X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Convenient Accident
card.text: Target Mook gets -8 until end of turn.

card.name: Costume Party Trick
card.text: Target Mook you control becomes a copy of target Mook you don't control.

card.name: Cross Examination
card.text: Target player reveals their hand. If they have more Mooks in their hand than you control, put the top card of your Arsenal into your Backup Plans. Otherwise, draw a card.

card.name: Cutthroat Futurist
card.text:
Ability: When you would draw a card, you exploit instead. To exploit, reveal the top card of your Arsenal and put it under a card you control, or into your hand.
Pressure: Once per game, choose two target machines. Blow up one of them and take control of the other one.
Static: Your Mooks get +1 for each card under them.

card.name: Dead Man's Switch
card.text:
Play this only when one of your Unique Mooks is blown up.
Blow up target Mook, Base, or Machine. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Deadly Neurotoxin
card.text: Mooks get -3 from poison until end of turn.

card.name: Death Metal Bard
card.text: Your other Mooks get +3 while assaulting.

card.name: Death Ray
card.text:
At the start of your turn, put the top card of your Arsenal under this card.
At the end of your turn, if this card has three or more cards under it, discard them all. If you do, blow up any target.

card.name: Deepweb Search
card.text: Search your Arsenal for a Mook with Threat Level 4 or less, or a Machine. Put that card into your hand, then shuffle and toss two cards from the top of your Arsenal.

card.name: Defenestrate
card.text: Blow up target Unique Mook or target Mook with threat level 8 or higher.

card.name: Demolition Accord
card.text: Vote for a Machine, then blow it up. If your choice was blown up this way, take control.

card.name: Demolitions Expert
card.text:
Ability: At the start of your turn, if you control 7 or more bases with different names, you win the game.
Pressure: Once per game, until end of turn, your Schemes can target Mooks and Machines that can't be targeted.
Static: Once per turn, whenever one of your Mooks is blown up by an ability, you can blow up target Mook with a lower threat level.

card.name: Deploy Hypnodrones
card.text: Shuffle your hand into your Arsenal, then draw that many cards. Then, for each card drawn this way, up to one target Mook can't block this turn.

card.name: Discount Quantum Singularity
card.text:
Unique
This Machine counts toward one requirement of any type.
The first time you hire a Mook that has a requirement during your turn, draw a card.

card.name: Distraction Fabricator
card.text: Whenever an enemy declares an assault, you can target one of their Mooks. If you do, that Mook can't assault this turn.

card.name: Do Not Fail Me
card.text:
You can play this whenever one of your Mooks is targeted or blocks.
Target Mook gets +6 until end of turn.

card.name: Drafting Machine
card.text: Whenever you would draw a card, you can blow up this Machine instead. If you do, search your Arsenal for a Blueprint and play it, then shuffle.

card.name: Dragon Cosplayer
card.text:
When this Mook onboards, put the top two cards of your Arsenal under it.
This Mook gets +1 for each card under it.

card.name: Drone Pilot
card.text:
Requires 2 Machines
Whenever you declare an assault, hire a token Mook. Then you can blow up one of your tokens. If you do, target Mook gets +4 until end of turn.

card.name: Encourage Forest Fires
card.text:
Discard or liquidate a Mook as a cost.
Blow up target Base, then draw a card.

card.name: Enhanced Employee
card.text:
Requires 1 Mook, 1 Machine
You can play a second Scheme each turn.

card.name: Escape Pods
card.text: When you're assaulted successfully, blow up this Machine instead of taking any Backup Plans.

card.name: Evil Doctor
card.text:
Ability: You start the game with a Blueprint from your Arsenal in play.
Pressure: Once per game, hire two token Mooks.
Static: Whenever you hire one or more token Mooks, you hire that many plus one instead.

card.name: Evil Laugh
card.text:
Play only when a player declares an assault on you.
Until end of turn, whenever a Mook assaults, it gets -2.

card.name: Evil Supercomputer
card.text: You can play an extra Scheme each turn.

card.name: Experimental Portal Donation
card.text:
Discard two cards as a cost. Draw two cards.
When you take this Scheme as a Backup Plan, you can reveal it to play it immediately, ignoring its costs.

card.name: Exponential Scheme
card.text: Reveal the top four cards of your Arsenal. Put all the Schemes among those cards into your hand, and toss the rest. You can play another Scheme this turn.

card.name: Fake Your Death
card.text: Put a card from your hand on top of your Backup Plans.

card.name: Finn Dorset, Hired Biologist
card.text:
Requires 4 Mooks
Unique
Whenever another nontoken Mook you control is blown up by an effect, hire a token Mook.

card.name: Flagbearer Mook
card.text: Whenever an enemy targets one of your Mooks, you can change the target to this Mook

card.name: Foil Plans
card.text: Target enemy discards two cards, then draws two cards.

card.name: Forest Treehouse
card.text:
You can't fabricate Machines.
Your Mooks get +3 when defending.

card.name: Freelance Reporter
card.text:
Your Mooks can't be targeted by Schemes.
Whenever you take a Backup Plan, you can discard that card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Gamma Ray Burst
card.text:
You can blow up one of your Machines as a cost. If you do, target Mook gets +5 from radiation.
Target Mook gets -2 from radiation.

card.name: Gas Mask Mook
card.text: Immune to poison.

card.name: Gen Z Nero, Doomposter
card.text:
Requires 2 Mooks
Unique Skilled Defender
At the start of your turn, blow up each Active Base. For each Base blown up this way, return target Mook to its owner's hand.

card.name: General Gruff, Tactician
card.text:
Requires 3 Mooks, 1 Machine, Turn 4 or later
Unique
Your Mooks have Skilled Attacker.

card.name: Generic Radicalist
card.text: When this Mook onboards, target player tosses the top three cards of their Arsenal.

card.name: Genetic Experiment Vat
card.text: ðŸ”˜Blow up this Machine and one of your Mooks as a cost. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your Arsenal until you reveal a Mook. Hire the revealed Mook, ignoring its requirements, then put the rest of the revealed cards on the bottom of your Arsenal in any order.

card.name: Ghost Gun Fabricator
card.text: ðŸ”˜Blow up this Machine as a cost. If you do, target Mook gets +7 until end of turn.

card.name: Gifted Programmer
card.text:
When this Mook onboards, draw a card.
When you take this Mook as a Backup Plan, you can reveal it to hire it. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Gifted Tactician
card.text:
Ability: At the start of your turn, if you control 7 or more bases with different names, you win the game.
Pressure: Once per game, if one or more of your Mooks would be blown up by an ability, they gain invincible until end of turn.
Static: After an enemy you're assaulting chooses defenders, you can have target Mook you control get Skilled Attacker until end of turn.

card.name: Guerilla Fighter
card.text: When you take this Mook as a Backup Plan, you can reveal it to hire it. When this Mook onboards this way, hire a token Mook.

card.name: Hack the Mainframe
card.text: Target player reveals their hand and discards all Schemes and Blueprints among them.

card.name: Hacked Lucky Cat
card.text: The first time you would draw a card each turn, instead look at the top card of your Arsenal. You can toss that card. Then draw a card.

card.name: Hamster Treadmill
card.text: Whenever you draw your first card each turn, you can discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Hand Out RPGs
card.text: Until end of turn, whenever one of your Mooks assaults, blow up target Machine.

card.name: Haunted Castle
card.text: You can fabricate an extra Machine each turn. When you do, draw a card.

card.name: Hazmat Trooper
card.text: Immune to poison, disease, and radiation.

card.name: Helicopter Pilot
card.text: Your Machines that are also Mooks have Skilled Attacker and Skilled Defender.

card.name: High-Powered Hologram Projector
card.text:
Your Active Base can't be targeted.
Whenever you switch your Active Base, blow up this Machine.

card.name: Hire Contractor
card.text:
Requires Turn 3 or later
Hire a Mook from your hand, ignoring its requirements.

card.name: Hold for Ransom
card.text:
Put this card under target Mook and take control of it. It can't declare an assault or use its activated effects.
Whenever its owner would draw a card, they can have you draw two cards instead. If they do, discard this card and this effect ends.

card.name: Hot Potato Goon
card.text: Whenever this Mook assaults, if it's blown up in combat or the assault fails, blow up target Machine.

card.name: HR Representative
card.text: Mooks in your hand have -1 to each of their requirements.

card.name: Hulk Mook
card.text:
Requires 2 Mooks
While assaulting, this Mook gets +2 for each other assaulting Mook.

card.name: Human Resources HQ
card.text:
You can liquidate Mooks instead of other card types to pay costs.
Whenever you liquidate one or more Mooks to pay a cost, reveal cards from the top of your Arsenal until you reveal a Mook. Put it into your hand and the rest on the bottom in any order.

card.name: Immoral Executive
card.text:
Ability: When you would draw a card, you exploit instead. To exploit, reveal the top card of your Arsenal and put it under a card you control, or into your hand.
Pressure: Once per game, exploit 3.
Static:

card.name: Indomitable Mook
card.text: This Mook has Threat Level 6.

card.name: Industrial Wasp Nest
card.text: Whenever you draw one or more cards, target Mook gets -2 until end of turn for each card you drew.

card.name: Influencer for Hire
card.text: When this Mook onboards, target player reveals their hand and each of their facedown cards. For each card revealed this way, this Mook gets +1 until end of turn.

card.name: Intern Engineer
card.text: When this Mook onboards, for each of your Blueprints, you can trigger its start-of-turn ability. If you do, you can't win the game because of that Blueprint this turn.

card.name: Invest in Crypto
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your Arsenal. Hire one as a token Mook, put one into your hand, and toss the last one.

card.name: Island Skull Base
card.text: Enemies can't target your Blueprints or Mooks.

card.name: Ivan Ivanovich, Assassin
card.text:
Unique Skilled Attacker
When this Mook assaults, target Mook gets -5 from poison.

card.name: Kid's Science Museum
card.text:
Your Scientists get +2.
Once per turn, when one of your Scientists is targeted, you can change that target to a Mook you don't control.
When an enemy blows up this Base, they reveal their hand and you choose a card from it. They discard that card.

card.name: Lab Rat Escape
card.text: Blow up target Machine and target facedown Machine.

card.name: Labcoat Distributor
card.text: Your Mooks are also Scientists.

card.name: Laser Grid Defense
card.text: Whenever an enemy assaults you with more than three Mooks, you can blow up this Machine as a cost before declaring defenders. If you do, blow up target Mook that's assaulting you.

card.name: Lasergun Enforcer
card.text:
Requires 1 Machine
Your other Lasergun Enforcers get +2.

card.name: Makeshift Battleship
card.text: When you fabricate this Machine, it becomes a Mook with Threat Level 6. Then, you can put up to two of your Machines under it. While it's a Mook, it gets +6 for each Machine card under it.

card.name: Manipulative Chatbot
card.text: Onboarding abilities of Mooks you onboard trigger twice.

card.name: Master Engineer
card.text:
Ability: You start the game with a Blueprint from your Arsenal in play.
Pressure: Once per game, you can fabricate three additional Machines this turn.
Static: The first time one of your Machines is blown up by an ability each turn, you can put that card on top of your Backup Plans faceup.

card.name: Master Impersonator
card.text: This Mook onboards as a copy of target Mook.

card.name: Metal Fist Bruiser
card.text:
Requires 2 Mooks
When this Mook assaults, it gets +1 for each Machine you control and -1 for each Machine defending player controls.

card.name: Meteor Strike Magnet
card.text: At the start of your turn, if this Blueprint has 5 cards under it, each other player loses the game. If not, put one of your Backup Plans under it, face-up.

card.name: Meticulous Vibe Check
card.text: Blow up five target Mooks.

card.name: Minigun Mook
card.text:
Requires 1 Mook, 1 Machine
While you're being assaulted, this Mook gets +8.

card.name: Minion Fabricator
card.text:
Once per turn, whenever you hire a nontoken Mook, hire a token Mook.
Your tokens Mooks have Threat Level 3.

card.name: Mook Lobbyist
card.text: ðŸ”˜Look at the top card of your Arsenal. If it's a Scheme, put it into your hand.

card.name: Mook Mastermind
card.text:
Requires 6 Scheme cards in your Garbage Pile
Unique
Once per turn, you can reveal cards from the top of your Arsenal until you reveal a Scheme. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom in any order.

card.name: Mook Teamlead
card.text: This Mook gets +1 for each of your other Mooks.

card.name: Mook Technician
card.text: When this Mook onboards, you can fabricate an additional Machine this turn.

card.name: Mook Telemarketer
card.text: ðŸ”˜Discard a Machine. Draw a card.

card.name: Moon Base
card.text:
You cannot be assaulted by 3 or fewer Mooks.
Enemies can't target your Machines or facedown cards.

card.name: Napol Eon, Master Bombardier
card.text:
Requires 2 Mooks, 2 Bases
Unique Skilled Attacker
Whenever this Mook assaults, blow up the defender's Active Base.

card.name: Nautical Station
card.text:
Enemies can't target you.
Whenever an enemy declares an assault, up to one target Machine you control becomes a Mook with threat level 6 until end of turn.

card.name: Octopus Trainer
card.text:
Mooks in enemy hands have +1 to their requirements.
Whenever you hire a nontoken Mook, you can discard a card. If you do, hire a token Mook.

card.name: Outsource Violence
card.text:
Requires Turn 3 or later
Hire three tokens.

card.name: Petty Larceny
card.text: Choose target enemy and name a card type. They reveal the top three cards of their Arsenal. For each card of the chosen type revealed this way, draw a card. They toss those cards.

card.name: Plan Ahead
card.text:
Draw two cards.
If you take this Scheme as a Backup Plan, you can reveal it to play it immediately. If you do, draw three cards instead.

card.name: Poison Gas Defense
card.text: Mooks assaulting you get -1 from poison.

card.name: Power Plant
card.text: You can fabricate an additional Machine during each of your turns.

card.name: President Todd Bonzalez
card.text:
Requires 3 politicians
Unique
The first time one of your Schemes resolves each turn, play it again.

card.name: Property Monopoly
card.text: For each Base you don't control, take control of it unless its controller discards a card.

card.name: Psychic Experiments
card.text: Toss the top three cards of your Arsenal, then put the top card of your Arsenal on top of your Backup Plans.

card.name: Puppet Dictator
card.text:
Ability: At the start of the game, vote for who takes control. While you're in control, you draw an additional card at the start of your turn.
Pressure: Once per game, take control. If you do, your Mooks get +2 until your next turn.
Static: If you start your turn in control, have 5 or more Mooks and control the most Mooks, you win the game.

card.name: Queen of Criminality
card.text:
Requires 2 Mooks
Unique
At the end of your turn, any player can discard a card. If no one does, blow up target Machine and draw a card.

card.name: Quickdraw Cowboy
card.text: Unique Slippery (This Mook escapes combat if it would lose.)

card.name: Racecar Mechanic
card.text: Once per turn, reveal the top card of your Arsenal. If it's a Machine, play it facedown. If not, toss it.

card.name: Recognize Real
card.text: Blow up all tokens.

card.name: Representative Fallman
card.text:
Unique
Whenever one or more of your Mooks would be blown up, you can blow up any one of your Mooks instead.

card.name: Reveal Conspiracy
card.text: Target enemy shuffles their hand into their Arsenal, then reveals that many cards plus two from the top. Separate the cards into two piles. They choose one pile, and toss the other.

card.name: Rocket Trooper
card.text:
Requires 1 Machine
This Mook gets +8 while assaulting.

card.name: Ron Jambo
card.text:
Requires Turn 6 or later
Unique Skilled Attacker Skilled Defender
Whenever this Mook assaults alone, it can't be blocked.

card.name: Samantha Rax, Neurotoxicologist
card.text:
Unique Slippery (This Mook escapes combat if it would lose.)
When this Mook escapes combat, blow up the Mooks it was blocking or blocked by.
Your Mooks are immune to poison.

card.name: Satellite Backup
card.text: When you fabricate this Machine, put it under another Machine. If that Machine would be blown up by an ability, blow up this Machine instead.

card.name: Scale Down
card.text: Each player chooses and blows up one of their Mooks, Bases, or Machines.

card.name: Scavenge for Parts
card.text: Toss cards from the top of your Arsenal until you find a Machine card. Put that card into your hand.

card.name: Scour the Sands
card.text:
Blow up one of your Mooks as a cost. If you do, blow up target Machine.
When you take this Scheme as a Backup Plan, you can reveal it to play it immediately, ignoring its costs.

card.name: Scout Platform
card.text: Each player plays with the top card of their Arsenal revealed.

card.name: Secret Agent Mook
card.text:
Skilled Attacker
When this Mook assaults a player successfully, remove up to one card from under target Blueprint they control.

card.name: Secret Mountain Alcove
card.text: You don't lose the game because of abilities.

card.name: Self Destruct
card.text:
Play only when you're successfully assaulted.
Blow up target Mook that assaulted you. Draw a card.

card.name: Senator Warhawk
card.text:
Unique
Other players must assault during their turn if able, and that assault must be against players that aren't you, if able.

card.name: Skill Drain
card.text:
Play any time an assault is declared.
Until end of turn, Mooks lose Skilled Attacker and Skilled Defender.

card.name: Skilled Therapist
card.text: Whenever a Mook you control becomes the target of an ability, you can return that Mook to your hand.

card.name: Sleep with the Fishes
card.text: Target player liquidates their Mook with the lowest threat level.

card.name: Small Hadron Collider
card.text: At the start of your turn, you can blow up this Machine as a cost. If you do, blow up target Machine or Base.

card.name: Sniper Jezail
card.text: Skilled Defender (This Mook can't be paired by the assaulting player.)

card.name: Social Engineering Major
card.text: When this Mook onboards, take control of target Machine.

card.name: Sorting Machine
card.text: When you fabricate this Machine, look at the top three cards of your Arsenal and put them back in any order.

card.name: Space Station
card.text:
You can only be assaulted by three or fewer Mooks.
You cannot hire a Mook unless you have more Machines than Mooks.

card.name: Space Suit Test Dummy
card.text: This Mook isn't blown up by combat with Mooks of Threat Level 6 or higher.

card.name: Spec Ops Agent
card.text: Whenever this Mook assaults, you can blow up a Mook, Machine, or Base (do this before the defender declares whether or not they're blocking).

card.name: Spy Plane
card.text:
Requires 1 Mook
Once per turn, you can look at target facedown Machine, then flip this Machine facedown.

card.name: Steal Inheritance
card.text:
Discard a card as a cost.
Draw three cards.

card.name: Steve Gunman
card.text: The first time you assault unsuccessfully each turn, you can declare "I'll be back". If you do, you can assault again this turn.

card.name: Strategic Genius
card.text:
Ability: At the start of your turn, if you control 7 or more bases with different names, you win the game.
Pressure: Once per game, if you've got no cards in your hand, draw three cards.
Static: Your Mooks get +1 for each nontoken Mook you've hired this turn.

card.name: Study the Enemy
card.text: Name a card type, then target enemy reveals the top three cards of their Arsenal. If any of those cards are of the chosen type, you draw a card. Then that player shuffles.

card.name: Suit Distributor
card.text: Your Mooks are also Henchmen.

card.name: Super Villain
card.text:
Ability: You start the game with a Blueprint from your Arsenal in play.
Pressure: Once per game, the next Scheme you play this turn has no costs and can't be stopped.
Static: Whenever another player plays a Scheme that targets one or more of your Blueprints, draw a card.

card.name: Test Experimental Weapon
card.text:
Liquidate a Machine as a cost. If you do, blow up target Mook.
When you take this Scheme as a Backup Plan, you can reveal it to play it immediately, ignoring its costs.

card.name: Thief Mook
card.text: When this Mook assaults successfully, draw a card.

card.name: Threaten Endangered Animals
card.text: Search your Arsenal for up to three Machines. Choose one of them in secret and put it facedown. After you shuffle, put the rest on top in any order.

card.name: Tony Contralto, Mob Dictator
card.text:
Unique
Other Henchmen you control can't be targeted by the abilities of Mooks you don't control.
ðŸ”˜Target Henchman gets +5 until end of turn.

card.name: Twinned Siblings
card.text: When this Mook onboards, hire a token Mook.

card.name: Underwater Bubble Dome
card.text:
You can't be assaulted by Robots or Cyborgs.
At the start of your turn, you can liquidate a Machine. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Unethical Head Hunter
card.text: When this Mook onboards, you can reveal the top five cards of your Arsenal. If you do, put a Mook from among them into your hand and the rest on the bottom in any order.

card.name: Unguarded Shark Tank
card.text: Whenever an enemy declares an assault, choose target Mook that player controls. That player may discard a card. If they don't, that Mook can't assault this turn.

card.name: Unlicensed Disintegration
card.text: Blow up target Machine, then draw a card. Then discard a card if it wasn't your Machine.

card.name: Unstoppable Giant Robot
card.text: At the start of your turn, put one of your Machines under this Blueprint. Then, if this card has six or more Machines under it, it becomes a Mook with Threat Level 32, and has "When this Mook assaults successfully, the defending player loses the game."

card.name: Vaccination Conspiracist
card.text:
Immune to Scientists
While this Mook is assaulting, defending Mooks get -1 from disease.

card.name: Vampire Cosplayer
card.text: When this Mook onboards, blow up another target Mook with lower threat level. If you do, that Mook's controller draws a card.

card.name: Villainous Lapcat
card.text: Whenever you would take a Backup Plan, you can put this card on top of your Backup Plans faceup instead. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Weather Control Device
card.text:
At the start of your turn, put the top card of your Arsenal under this card. Then, if this card has three or more Schemes under it, blow up target Base.
At the end of your turn, if this card has 8 or more Machines under it, you win the game.

card.name: WMD Enthusiast
card.text: When this Mook onboards, blow up all Mooks. Until end of turn, whenever a Mook onboards, it's blown up by radiation.

card.name: Wonder Hunter
card.text: Your Scientists get +2.
